uvi.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.4.136
uvi.description:
KVM: PPC: Fix kvm_arch_vcpu_ioctl vcpu_load leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.136 by commit f38527f1890543cdfca8dfd06f75f9887cce6151, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit b3cebfe8c1cadf1817939dcc3688a2504a69c662. For more details please see the references link.
